response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a discounted rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction for you.", "product_price": 1200000}
